title: No CIs displayed in a grid in Service Management
content:
No CIs are displayed when you load Devices in a Service Management grid and the filter or order contains non-federated fields.

Cause

This issue may occur because the data includes old Devices that don't have bitmap or bitposition values, which are part of the primary key of device. When a filter or order contains non-federated fields, the query needs to make a join on the unique key.

Solution

Make sure that all Devices have a bitmap and bit position value. To do this, you can run the updateEmptyBitmapIds function in the JMX console in UCMDB.
